hero.subtitle: MENA Smart Administration
hero.description: The first AI platform dedicated to modernizing administrative procedures in the MENA region. A digital revolution powered by our model

problem.title: A colossal
problem.description1: In the MENA region, administrative procedures are synonymous with excessive delays, endless paperwork and citizen frustration.
problem.description2: Waiting lines, lost documents, contradictory information... A reality we decided to transform radically.

steps.title: Ask naturally
steps.desc: "How do I get my birth certificate?"

steps.title: Immediate response 24/7
steps.desc: Via our ultra-secure and high-performance cloud

symd1.title: Sym-D1
symd1.subtitle: Our revolutionary digital brain
symd1.description: Developed entirely by Symloop, Sym-D1 is a proprietary model designed to understand the MENA regional context, anticipate administrative needs and continuously learn from each interaction.

versions.title: Continuous evolution of ASA
versions.subtitle: Discover how ASA evolves to better serve citizens in the MENA region

timeline.title: Initial launch
timeline.desc: Solid foundation to support the most common procedures with an intuitive interface.

timeline.title: AI engine optimization
timeline.desc: More precise contextual analysis for more relevant and personalized responses.

timeline.title: Extended multilingual support
timeline.desc: Complete support for Arabic, French and English for all citizens.

timeline.title: Advanced machine learning
timeline.desc: Sym-D1 improves its reasoning and accuracy with each citizen interaction.

cta.title: Let's build together
cta.description: ASA is not simply a project, it's a revolutionary movement. Join the digital transformation with Symloop and revolutionize administration for all citizens.
cta.footer: Developed with ❤️ by Symloop for the MENA region
